content: sweet textured coasters that are the perfect combination of kitsch and a little boho make one or a set - for personal home or office use for gifting or for market stall stock three design variations are included in the paid pdf the most basic design variation is provided for free on the crochet fix blog https //thecrochetfix com/2021/07/23/swirly-bloom-coasters/ 1 perfect for stash-busting - requires only ~10-20 g/ 0 35-0 70 oz of yarn per coaster quick to whip up use a yarn that does not pill readily and is easy to wash depending on yarn choice dk or worsted coaster will be approx 12cm/4 75 to 16cm/6 3 in diameter from petal peak to opposite petal peak use a single solid colour or multiple solid colours or a graded colour change yarn intermediate to advanced difficulty please tag me @thecrochetfix on social media and hash tag your projects #swirlybloomcoasters thanks to the following awesome testers for testing this pattern tania barry @shewgirl1 on ig and shewgirl on ravelry jesse st clair @anchored makers on ig and anchoredmakers on ravelry ilyssa stein @cuttlefishcrochet on ig fb and etsy amy barber @lil_aymsz on ig jacqui jones 1 https //thecrochetfix com/2021/07/23/swirly-bloom-coasters/
